live_updates: Our crews have restored services to the area. Thank you for your patience!
Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
51797.summary: Some customers in the Regent area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
51797.title: July 21 - Winnipeg (Regent) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
